ticket.title: problem with attachments in lighthouse
ticket.original-body: @@@ text $ wget --no-check-certificate -S https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch --2009-12-02 14:46:53-- https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch Resolving rails.lighthouseapp.com... 65.74.177.132 Connecting to rails.lighthouseapp.com|65.74.177.132|:443... connected. version.body:
Downloading some attachments does not work. The hostname it redirects to is invalid.
Try going here: https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419-raise-specific-exceptions-for-violated-database-constraints
and clicking on the attached patch.
Here's what wget says:
@@@ text $ wget --no-check-certificate -S https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch --2009-12-02 14:46:53-- https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch Resolving rails.lighthouseapp.com... 65.74.177.132 Connecting to rails.lighthouseapp.com|65.74.177.132|:443... connected. WARNING: cannot verify rails.lighthouseapp.com's certificate, issued by `/C=US/ST=Arizona/L=Scottsdale/O=GoDaddy.com, Inc./OU=http://certificates.godaddy.com/repository/CN=Go Daddy Secure Certification Authority/serialNumber=07969287': Unable to locally verify the issuer's authority. HTTP request sent, awaiting response... HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Server: nginx/0.6.35 Date: Wed, 02 Dec 2009 22:46:53 GMT Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Connection: keep-alive X-Runtime: 12ms Location: http:///activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1259794313&Signature=UdftqT3eiWLhCU7sr0VP28zp9lk%3D Cache-Control: no-cache Content-Length: 269 Set-Cookie: _rails_lh_session_id=c74de77e7280f9f2d5c66cbae2336288; domain=.lighthouseapp.com; path=/ Location: http:///activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1259794313&Signature=UdftqT3eiWLhCU7sr0VP28zp9lk%3D [following] http:///activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1259794313&Signature=UdftqT3eiWLhCU7sr0VP28zp9lk%3D: Invalid host name. @@@
version.body-html:
Downloading some attachments does not work. The hostname it redirects to is invalid.

Try going here:
https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419-raise-sp...

and clicking on the attached patch.

Here's what wget says:

$ wget --no-check-certificate -S https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch
--2009-12-02 14:46:53--  https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch
Resolving rails.lighthouseapp.com... 65.74.177.132
Connecting to rails.lighthouseapp.com|65.74.177.132|:443... connected.
WARNING: cannot verify rails.lighthouseapp.com's certificate, issued by `/C=US/ST=Arizona/L=Scottsdale/O=GoDaddy.com, Inc./OU=http://certificates.godaddy.com/repository/CN=Go Daddy Secure Certification Authority/serialNumber=07969287':
  Unable to locally verify the issuer's authority.
HTTP request sent, awaiting response... 
  HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily
  Server: nginx/0.6.35
  Date: Wed, 02 Dec 2009 22:46:53 GMT
  Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8
  Connection: keep-alive
  X-Runtime: 12ms
  Location: http:///activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1259794313&Signature=UdftqT3eiWLhCU7sr0VP28zp9lk%3D
  Cache-Control: no-cache
  Content-Length: 269
  Set-Cookie: _rails_lh_session_id=c74de77e7280f9f2d5c66cbae2336288; domain=.lighthouseapp.com; path=/
Location: http:///activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1259794313&Signature=UdftqT3eiWLhCU7sr0VP28zp9lk%3D [following]
http:///activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1259794313&Signature=UdftqT3eiWLhCU7sr0VP28zp9lk%3D: Invalid host name.
version.title: problem with attachments in lighthouse

version.body:
maybe was a temporarly broken redirect to amazon s3?
For me it works now:
wget --no-check-certificate -S https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch --2010-04-11 05:08:57-- https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057/db-exceptions.patch Resolving rails.lighthouseapp.com... 65.74.177.132 Connecting to rails.lighthouseapp.com|65.74.177.132|:443... connected. HTTP request sent, awaiting response... HTTP/1.1 302 Moved Temporarily Server: nginx/0.6.35 Date: Sun, 11 Apr 2010 03:08:58 GMT Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8 Connection: keep-alive X-Runtime: 8ms Location: http://s3.amazonaws.com/activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1270955638&Signature=3niKmOrmgPMRkmS2tfZ0NP7iKos%3D Cache-Control: no-cache Content-Length: 285 Set-Cookie: _rails_lh_session_id=8d2a83c64ceebf30ca332346c21e328c; domain=.lighthouseapp.com; path=/ Location: http://s3.amazonaws.com/activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1270955638&Signature=3niKmOrmgPMRkmS2tfZ0NP7iKos%3D [following] --2010-04-11 05:08:58-- http://s3.amazonaws.com/activereload-lighthouse/assets/f2071750b8108647526b56696a51fadf64fc0b96/db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1270955638&Signature=3niKmOrmgPMRkmS2tfZ0NP7iKos%3D Resolving s3.amazonaws.com... 72.21.211.161 Connecting to s3.amazonaws.com|72.21.211.161|:80... connected. HTTP request sent, awaiting response... HTTP/1.1 200 OK x-amz-id-2: yO55s/IfR+9zDZViqaautU768Gq6KlJXbIMQNdvZ5J6YVB/ZSLekYaOIMTJy1ft7 x-amz-request-id: EBC176771CA26EC0 Date: Sun, 11 Apr 2010 03:09:00 GMT Last-Modified: Sat, 04 Jul 2009 05:28:14 GMT ETag: "26ce84872c17910e569d529e0f8e8bed" Content-Type: text/plain Content-Length: 8501 Connection: Keep-Alive Server: AmazonS3 Length: 8501 (8.3K) [text/plain] Saving to: `db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1270955638&Signature=3niKmOrmgPMRkmS2tfZ0NP7iKos='
100%[===========================================================================================================================>] 8,501 --.-K/s in 0.1s
2010-04-11 05:08:59 (68.3 KB/s) - `db-exceptions.patch?AWSAccessKeyId=1AJ9W2TX1B2Z7C2KYB82&Expires=1270955638&Signature=3niKmOrmgPMRkmS2tfZ0NP7iKos=' saved [8501/8501]
version.body-html:
maybe was a temporarly broken redirect to amazon s3?

For me it works now:

wget --no-check-certificate -S https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057...
--2010-04-11 05:08:57-- https://rails.lighthouseapp.com/projects/8994/tickets/2419/a/108057... Resolving rails.lighthouseapp.com... 65.74.177.132
